Feature.Name: Mind Thrust
Feature.Text: As an action, you blast psychic energy at one creature that you can see within 5 feet of you. The target must succeed on an Intelligence saving throw or take 1d6 psychic damage. If the target takes any of this damage, you can push it up to 10 feet away from you. The talentâ€™s damage increases by 1d6 when you reach 5th level (2d6), 11th level (3d6), and 17th level (4d6).

FeatureContainer.Source: Unearthed Arcana 6 - Psionics and the Mystic, Take 2
